metadata.feature_description: Provides hierarchical folder tree navigation with expand/collapse functionality and path breadcrumbs

steps.action: Navigated to Assets panel and clicked on Home folder dropdown to open the folder tree picker
steps.expected: Folder tree dropdown should open showing hierarchical folder structure
steps.actual: Folder tree dropdown opened showing Site Root with child folders (Badges, Groups, Images, Templates, TestFolder01, ToDelete, Users) and expand arrows for folders with children

steps.action: Clicked on expand arrow (Node) for Images folder
steps.expected: Images folder should expand showing child folders
steps.actual: Images folder expanded showing 'Publisher' subfolder. Results count increased from 8 to 9

steps.action: Clicked on expand arrow (Node) for Images folder again to collapse it
steps.expected: Images folder should collapse, hiding child folders
steps.actual: Images folder collapsed. Publisher subfolder is no longer visible. Results count returned to 8

steps.action: Clicked on Images folder link in the folder tree picker
steps.expected: Should navigate to Images folder and show its contents
steps.actual: Navigated to Images folder. Breadcrumb updated to 'HOME > IMAGES'. Content area shows Publisher subfolder and image files (cavalier-tv.png, CTA-*.jpg, etc.)

steps.action: Clicked on 'Home' in the breadcrumb while in Images folder
steps.expected: Should navigate back to Home/root folder
steps.actual: Navigated back to Home folder. Breadcrumb shows only 'HOME'. Content area shows root folders (Badges, Groups, Images, Templates, Users) and files

steps.action: Navigated from Home > Images > Publisher (3 levels deep)
steps.expected: Should be able to navigate to deeply nested folders with breadcrumb trail
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to Publisher folder. Breadcrumb shows 'HOME > IMAGES > PUBLISHER'. Content shows files in Publisher folder

steps.action: Clicked on 'IMAGES' in breadcrumb to navigate back one level
steps.expected: Should navigate back to Images folder
steps.actual: Successfully navigated back to Images folder. Breadcrumb updated to 'HOME > IMAGES'

steps.action: Observed initial sort order with 'Alphabetical' sort selected
steps.actual: Folders displayed in alphabetical order: Badges, Groups, Images, Templates, Users, followed by files in alphabetical order

steps.action: Changed sort dropdown from 'Alphabetical' to 'Last Modified'
steps.expected: Folders and files should reorder based on last modification date
steps.actual: Folder order changed to: Templates, Badges, Users, Groups, Images, SecureFolder. Sort dropdown shows all three options (Last Modified, Date Uploaded, Alphabetical). Order is now based on modification time

observations: The folder tree picker is accessible via the folder dropdown next to breadcrumbs
Folders with children display expand/collapse arrows (Node links)
The results count at the bottom of the folder picker updates dynamically as folders are expanded/collapsed
Sort functionality affects both folders and files in the content view, with three sort options: Last Modified, Date Uploaded, and Alphabetical
SecureFolder displays with a lock icon indicating it's a secure folder type
Breadcrumbs support deep navigation with clickable path segments for any level
